htmlbody:
Mission and Purpose

PB Partners are dedicated to community empowerment.

Formed as part of the legacy of the PB Unit, we are experts in the field of Participatory Budgeting(PB). We operate across England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, and can assist you in developing meangingful community engagement programmes that really ‘make people count’.

The PB Partners
Davy Jones       Jez Hall       Vince Howe      
Alan Budge       Amanda Murrell

PB Partners is administered by Shared Future CIC, a social enterprise with a track record in quality community engagement and development.

We work closely with Church Action on Poverty, hosts of the now closed PB Unit, and the newly formed PB Network.

The PB Network is an open forum for people who are interested in or champion PB. It has a volunteer steering group, and holds meeting and debates, both face to face and online, with the hope of deepening participatory democracy in the British Isles.
Contact us to find out more about the PB Network and how to get involved.

The PB Unit archives are a rich source of free information on how PB is being used in the UK and internationally. An introduction and overview of those resources is available here
title: PBPartners
